https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zJOB4pO9vr2LB3rWMvOZQsrQY99.jpg A poetic exploration of the multi-generational affects of Canada's Indian Residential School system, based on the personal trials of Aboriginal playwright Yvette Nolan. A Common Experience
